text:
When I discovered skateboard, I don't think it was a sport extreme. Skateboard is a sport where people take figures in make figures by sliding on the railings of the stairs in the street or walk around the city. But the skateboard is a sport which can be likely to be is an competition. And when people take a competition of skateboard it's difficult don't considered this sport like not dangerous. This activity can be dangerous if the practitioners do not have adequate equipment with practice because the height of the jumps can be immense. Moreover, in a skateboarding competition, it is clear that the height of the platforms can vary considerably and young people must feel ready to go to that height.
 This activity can be dangerous in the event of a fall. This fall can result in more or less serious injuries. It can range from a simple sprain to total paralysis. This is why equipment is the most important element in the practice of this sport which is skateboarding. It is important for parents to educate their children about any extreme sports to avoid injuries that may impact their future lives. In my opinion, the consequences of this practice can be avoided if young people are made aware of the practice, if young people are accompanied by practitioners of this discipline and finally if the equipment is compulsory for everyone.
